video_title: Miami DT Moten to Play vs Ole Miss
topic: miami 'confident' dt moten will play vs. ole miss

text: The University of Miami has expressed confidence that defensive tackle Leonard Moten will be available to play in their upcoming game against Ole Miss, according to recent reports.
As of now, there is no official word on the specifics of Moten's status, but the team appears to be preparing for his participation.
Moten's potential presence would be a significant boost to the Hurricanes' defense, and fans will be watching closely for any updates on his status ahead of the game.
The matchup between Miami and Ole Miss is highly anticipated, and Moten's involvement would be a key factor in the team's strategy and performance.
